attributes.additional_details: It has been made clear the Free Schools and Academies will be expected, by the government, to ensure that children  "protected from inappropriate teaching materials and learn the nature of marriage and its importance for family life and for bringing up children". This represents a biased message that will be given to children and by representing marriage as an ideal, will create the impression that LGBT relationships are abnormal. We the undersigned wish for this requirement to be dropped.
